snippet.title: The Peanuts Movie: Snoopy's Grand Adventure - Launch Trailer | PS4
snippet.description:
Family fun from your favorite film! Play as Snoopy and Woodstock on a grand adventure! Woodstock helps Snoopy through levels by collecting jelly beans, removing obsticles and unlocking secret areas!

© 2015 Twentieth Century Fox Film Corporation. All Rights Reserved. Peanuts © Peanuts Worldwide LLC. Game ©2015 Activision Publishing, Inc. Activision is a registered trademark of Activision Publishing, Inc. Opening the game box and using the software constitutes acceptance of the Software License Agreement available at support.activision.com/license. The “PS” Family logo is a registered trademark. “PS4” is a trademark of Sony Computer Entertainment Inc. The ESRB rating icon is a trademark of the Entertainment Software Association. All other trademarks and trade names are the properties of their respective owners.
